### âœ… **Definition of Done (DOD) Checklist**

#### **Code Quality**
- [ ] **Code Review**: Peer review completed and approved

- [ ] **Unit Tests**: >80% coverage achieved
- [ ] **Integration Tests**: All scenarios pass
- [ ] **Manual Tests**: All scenarios verified
- [ ] **Edge Cases**: Error conditions tested

#### **Documentation**
- [ ] **API Docs**: Updated if endpoints changed
- [ ] **Code Comments**: Added for complex logic
- [ ] **README**: Updated if user-facing changes
- [ ] **Educational Value**: Learning objectives preserved

#### **Security & Performance**
- [ ] **Security Scan**: No vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] **Input Validation**: All inputs validated
- [ ] **Error Handling**: Proper error responses
- [ ] **Performance**: Meets response time requirements

#### **Deployment Readiness**
- [ ] **Build**: Application builds successfully
- [ ] **Environment**: Works in target environment
- [ ] **Migration**: Database migrations tested (if applicable)
- [ ] **Rollback**: Rollback plan documented
